item.title: Trump: If states can't run elections 'honestly,' then 'somebody else should take over'
item.description: Trump had been asked what he meant when he called on members of the Republican Party to "take over the voting" in a recent interview with Dan Bongino.

item.title: Trump signs bill ending federal government shutdown
item.description: President Donald Trump signed a federal government funding package hours after the House of Representatives approved it.

item.title: Sen. Warner calls Gabbard to testify after Georgia election office raid, Trump FBI call
item.description: President Donald Trump, in an interview with former FBI deputy director and podcaster Dan Bongino, recently called on members of the Republican Party ...

item.title: How global shadow fleet of crude tankers is navigating high seas hunt for sanctioned Russian, Iranian, Venezuelan oil
item.description: President Trump says India will stop buying sanctioned Russian oil in trade deal, but data shows shadow fleet vessels on the move evading global enfor...

item.title: House hardliners complicate ending government shutdown as Speaker Johnson moves ahead
item.description: The U.S. government partially shut down Saturday morning after Congress failed to pass legislation to keep it funded.
